dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: SYF Offers Greater Flexibility With Apple Pay's Pay Later Feature
News Content: Synchrony Financial SYF recently made the Pay Later feature of Apple Pay available to eligible Synchrony Preferred Mastercard, Synchrony Plus World Mastercard or Synchrony Premier World Mastercard holders. The specified cardholders now have the flexibility to either utilize their credit card's standard terms or take advantage of a promotional offer featuring fixed monthly payments at checkout.

To utilize a Synchrony Mastercard with Apple Pay, cardholders must first add their card to Apple Wallet. When making purchases online or in app, using Apple Pay on an iPhone or iPad, customers can select their Synchrony Mastercard. If eligible, they can select the Pay Later option to view available promotional offers. They can then choose their preferred option and complete the fast and convenient checkout process with Apple Pay.

Apple Pay offers a secure, private and convenient payment experience for its users. When using a Synchrony Mastercard with Apple Pay, transaction details remain confidential, as Apple does not store any information associated with the user's purchases.

Synchrony plans to extend the option to pay for eligible purchases using fixed monthly payments to a broader range of Apple Pay users within its portfolio of co-branded cards. Later this year, customers will also gain the ability to view and redeem rewards from eligible Synchrony-issued cards while checking out online or in app on iPhone and iPad with Apple Pay.

Therefore, the ulterior motive of Synchrony behind the recent announcement remains to offer a greater level of choice and flexibility to its customers at the time of checkout. The availability of a suitable financing solution that removes the need to make lumpsum payments and does not exert pressure on one’s finances may boost the purchasing power of consumers.

Benefits of the Recent Move to Synchrony

The facility of providing simplified digital transactions and addressing the diversified credit needs of customers is expected to attract newer customers to Synchrony as well as retain existing ones. Increased utilization of Synchrony’s credit cards may bring growth in interest and fees on loans, from which SYF mainly earns its revenues. Interest and fees on loans advanced 10.5% year over year in the first nine months of 2024.

The well-earned reputation of SYF can be attributed to its digital and analytics expertise. A series of acquisitions and partnerships, coupled with tech investments, have strengthened the company’s digital arm. This, in turn, has fetched several program agreements with some of the nation’s leading retailers and manufacturers.

Story Continues

SYF’s Share Price Performance & Zacks Rank

Shares of Synchrony have gained 89.6% in the past year compared with the industry’s 24.5% growth. SYF currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).Zacks Investment Research

Image Source: Zacks Investment Research

Stocks to Consider

Some better-ranked stocks in the Finance space are Intercorp Financial Services Inc. IFS, Ameriprise Financial, Inc. AMP and Civista Bancshares, Inc. CIVB. While Intercorp Financial Services sports a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) at present, Ameriprise Financial and Civista Bancshares carries Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) each. You can see the complete list of today’s Zacks #1 Rank stocks here.

The bottom line of Intercorp Financial Services outpaced estimates in three of the last four quarters and missed the mark once, the average surprise being 36.17%. The Zacks Consensus Estimate for IFS’ 2025 earnings suggests an improvement of 48.2% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for revenues suggests growth of 9% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for IFS’ 2025 earnings has moved 0.7% north in the past 60 days.

Ameriprise Financial’s earnings outpaced estimates in three of the trailing four quarters and missed the mark once, the average surprise being 0.99%. The Zacks Consensus Estimate for AMP’s 2025 earnings suggests an improvement of 14.6% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for revenues suggests growth of 7.6% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for AMP’s 2025 earnings has moved 0.4% north in the past 30 days.

The bottom line of Civista Bancshares outpaced estimates in three of the last four quarters and missed the mark once, the average surprise being 7.72%. The Zacks Consensus Estimate for CIVB’s 2025 earnings suggests an improvement of 8.2% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for revenues suggests growth of 6.4% from the 2024 estimate. The consensus mark for CIVB’s 2025 earnings has moved 1.5% north in the past 30 days.

Shares of Intercorp Financial Services, Ameriprise Financial and Civista Bancshares have gained 28.2%, 45.8% and 21.8%, respectively, in the past year.

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The news indicates a rebound in Apple's stock despite a reported slump in iPhone sales in China, which is a significant market for the company. The fact that Apple has slipped to third place in smartphone sales in China could raise concerns among investors about its competitive position. However, the slight rebound suggests that the market may have already priced in some of this negative news, and there may be optimism regarding upcoming quarterly earnings. Given these mixed signals, I estimate a moderate probability of the stock price rising, but also a significant chance of it falling due to the underlying concerns about sales performance.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The article provides a mixed view of Apple (AAPL). While Apple's Q3 revenue and operating income exceeded expectations, the overall consumer electronics sector faces challenges from technological change. Apple's stock has already risen 1.7% since the earnings release, suggesting some positive sentiment is already priced in. The broader market update mentions potential uncertainty in 2025 due to future rate cuts and potential changes in trade policy and corporate taxes. Given the positive earnings beat, but also the potential headwinds and the fact that the stock has already seen a slight increase, I'm assigning a slightly higher probability to a further rise, but also acknowledging the risks.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news focuses on TSMC's challenges in expanding its Arizona plant, citing regulatory hurdles and labor shortages.  While TSMC produces chips for Apple, the news is indirect and doesn't directly impact Apple's financials or operations. The delays in TSMC's Arizona plant might lead to some minor supply chain concerns in the long term, but the impact on Apple is likely to be minimal, especially considering TSMC's reassurance about the Arizona facility's quality and its commitment to prioritizing Taiwan for its most advanced technology.  The news is more relevant to TSMC's stock price than Apple's.  Therefore, the probability of Apple's stock price moving significantly due to this news is low, with a slightly higher chance of a minor negative impact due to potential, albeit indirect, supply chain concerns.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news headline indicates mixed signals for Apple Inc. (AAPL). On one hand, there is a reported steep drop in iPhone sales in China, causing Apple to slip to third place in Chinese smartphone sales rankings, which is a negative indicator. On the other hand, the stock rebounded slightly after this news, suggesting some resilience or possibly priced-in expectations. Additionally, upcoming quarterly earnings and concerns over proposed Trump tariffs add uncertainty. Given the competing factors, the probability of a rise or fall is balanced but slightly tilted towards a negative sentiment due to the sales slump.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news article discusses Synchrony Financial's (SYF) recent announcement to offer Apple Pay's Pay Later feature to its eligible cardholders, providing them with greater flexibility and convenience at checkout. This development is expected to boost the company's purchasing power and attract new customers, potentially leading to increased interest and fees on loans. Given SYF's strong digital and analytics expertise, as well as its partnerships with leading retailers, the introduction of this feature is likely to have a positive impact on the company's stock performance. Additionally, SYF's share price has gained 89.6% in the past year, outperforming the industry's growth. However, the stock currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold), which might indicate a neutral or slightly positive outlook.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2, Reasoning: The news article discusses the partnership between Synchrony Financial (SYF) and Apple Inc. (AAPL) to offer the Pay Later feature on Apple Pay. This feature provides customers with greater flexibility and choice at checkout, potentially increasing purchasing power and driving growth in interest and fees on loans for SYF. The article also highlights SYF's strong digital and analytics expertise, as well as its reputation and growth prospects. However, the article does not provide a direct impact on AAPL's stock price. Considering the positive implications of the partnership for SYF and the lack of direct impact on AAPL, I estimate the probability of AAPL's stock price rising due to this news as moderate, while the probability of the stock price falling is relatively low.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The financial news discusses potential disruptions to the TikTok app due to regulatory issues, which may affect its availability on Apple's App Store. While the news primarily impacts TikTok and its parent company ByteDance, it could indirectly influence Apple's stock price if the situation leads to public concern or regulatory scrutiny affecting the broader tech sector. However, Apple itself is not directly involved in the sale or divestiture of TikTok, and the company's core business of hardware and software ecosystems remains intact.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news article discusses Synchrony Financial's (SYF) recent announcement to offer Apple Pay's Pay Later feature to its eligible cardholders. This development is expected to boost SYF's purchasing power and attract new customers, potentially leading to increased interest and fees on loans. However, the article does not provide a direct impact on Apple's (AAPL) stock price. Considering the positive implications of the partnership for SYF and the lack of direct impact on AAPL, I estimate the probability of AAPL's stock price rising due to this news as moderate. The overall sentiment seems neutral to slightly positive for AAPL, given that the news does not introduce significant negative factors directly affecting Apple's business.",

  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
```
